age_limit.indian_military_academy: Unmarried male candidates born not earlier than 2nd January, 2002 and not later than 1st January, 2007
age_limit.indian_naval_academy: Unmarried male candidates born not earlier than 2nd January, 2002 and not later than 1st January, 2007
age_limit.air_force_academy: 20 to 24 years as of 1st January, 2026 (born not earlier than 2nd January, 2002 and not later than 1st January, 2006)
age_limit.officers_training_academy: Unmarried male candidates born not earlier than 2nd January, 2001 and not later than 1st January, 2007; Unmarried women, issueless widows who have not remarried, and issueless divorcees who have not remarried, born not earlier than 2nd January, 2001 and not later than 1st January, 2007

education.indian_military_academy: Degree of a recognised University or equivalent.
education.indian_naval_academy: Degree in Engineering from a recognised University/Institution.
education.air_force_academy: Degree of a recognised University (with Physics and Mathematics at 10+2 level) or Bachelor of Engineering.
education.officers_training_academy: Degree of a recognised University or equivalent.

contact_details.address: Union Public Service Commission, Dholpur House, Shahjahan Road, New Delhi – 110069
